DDL.statement: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW view_label_data AS (SELECT APP_LABEL_DATA."UNIQUE_ID", APP_LABEL_DATA."PRINT_DATE", APP_LABEL_DATA."USER_ID", APP_LABEL_DATA."WORKSTATION_ID", APP_LABEL_DATA."MATERIAL", APP_LABEL_DATA."MATERIAL_TYPE", APP_LABEL_DATA."BATCH_NUMBER", APP_LABEL_DATA."PROCESS_ORDER", APP_LABEL_DATA."REQUIRED_RESOURCE", APP_LABEL_DATA."LOCATION_ID", APP_LABEL_DATA."PROD_QUANTITY", APP_LABEL_DATA."PROD_UOM", APP_LABEL_DATA."DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE", APP_LABEL_DATA."EXPIRY_DATE", APP_LABEL_DATA."EXPIRY_MODE", APP_LABEL_DATA."PROD_EAN", APP_LABEL_DATA."PROD_VARIANT", APP_LABEL_DATA."CUSTOMER_ID", APP_LABEL_DATA."PRINT_COPIES", APP_LABEL_DATA."PRINT_QUEUE_NAME", APP_LABEL_DATA."BASE_EAN", APP_LABEL_DATA."BASE_VARIANT", APP_LABEL_DATA."BASE_QUANTITY", APP_LABEL_DATA."BASE_UOM", APP_LABEL_DATA."MODULE_ID", APP_LABEL_DATA."OVERRIDE_MANUFACTURE_DATE", APP_LABEL_DATA."OVERRIDE_EXPIRY_DATE", APP_LABEL_DATA."OVERRIDE_BATCH_PREFIX", APP_LABEL_DATA."BATCH_PREFIX", APP_LABEL_DATA."BATCH_SUFFIX", APP_LABEL_DATA."LABEL_TYPE", APP_LABEL_DATA."LINE", APP_CUSTOMER.CUSTOMER_NAME, APP_MATERIAL.DESCRIPTION AS MATERIAL_DESCRIPTION, APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA.DATA AS PART_NO FROM APP_LABEL_DATA INNER JOIN APP_CUSTOMER ON APP_LABEL_DATA.CUSTOMER_ID = APP_CUSTOMER.CUSTOMER_ID INNER JOIN APP_MATERIAL ON APP_LABEL_DATA.MATERIAL = APP_MATERIAL.MATERIAL INNER JOIN APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA ON APP_LABEL_DATA.MATERIAL = APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA.MATERIAL AND APP_LABEL_DATA.CUSTOMER_ID = APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA.CUSTOMER_ID AND APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA.DATA_ID = 'PART_NO')
